decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawings:	1103/02-B (Proposed Ground Floor Plan); 1103/03-B (Proposed First Floor Plan); 1103/04-A (Proposed South East Elevation); 1103/05-A (Proposed North East Elevation); 1103/06 (Proposed South West Elevation);	1103-09 (Joinery Details for External Interventions); 1103/10-A (Proposed Second Floor Plan).
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.

| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings listed under condition 2.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the host property and its surroundings, in accordance with Policies 7.4, 7B and 7C of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013), Policies D3, D4 and HC1 of the London Plan (2021) and the NPPF (2023).
| The hereby approved replacement sash window to north east elevation shall contain only obscure glass and retained as such thereafter.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of occupants of nearby properties and future occupiers of the development, in accordance with Policies 7A and 7B of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013) and Policy DAA of Ealing's draft new Local Plan (Regulation 19).
description: Replacement doors to south east elevation; replacement sash window to north east elevation; and replacement door to south west elevation
